config.general.title: General
config.features.title: Features
options.RequireTool.desc: Require the hoe to be equiped.
options.ShowItems.desc: Draws item icons of predicted drops for dig spots when a hoe is equiped.
options.ShowOutlines.desc: Draws outlines around dig spots when a hoe is equiped.
options.ShowTrackers.desc: Display a menu that tracks nearby dig spots when a hoe is equiped.
options.TrackerMaxItemCount.desc: Maximum number of trackers shown, 0 for no limit.
